name: HOP (itch) (Mr.Dev@67)
description:
1.Introduction

HOP is the first game, I have made using unity, it definitely has some issues but those issues are barely noticeable. This game is based on high speed and momentum and it could be a good speedrunning game if it was good at all, but as I have to attend classes  therefore I made this game in 2 days and this game is currently in development, I will probably release a few updates and will add some more features in this game in future.

2.How To Play

w - Move forward

s - Move backwards

a - Move left

d- Move right

Space - Jump

Ctrl - To Crouch

Left Mouse click - To use Grappling Gun.

3.About

There are 3 levels in this game and a hidden level which is really easy to find, sorry the options button in this game doesn't work. Grappling gun is only available in level 1.
